options.name: Reaction : Ambusher
options.description: While hidden in a natural environment and either entering or about to start combat, you immediately take a valid action. This action takes place before the initial preparation phase.

options.name: Windsense
options.description: You are naturally attuned to the motion of the wind. Gain +1 skill with senses. When making a ranged or throwing attack in an environment with wind, you can curve your projectile around a single tile, potentially negating cover bonuses or avoiding obstacles.

options.name: Zoologist
options.description: Gain +1 skill with academics. When making a check to recall information about a plant or beast, you can add an academics dice into the dice pool.

options.name: Outdoorsy
options.description: Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. While you are in a natural environment, you gain a bonus dice to any resilience checks.

options.name: Action : Kick Dirt
options.description: While in a natural environment, you use the natural terrain to your advantage and kick particles of sand, silt, dirt at a creature within a very short (5 unit) distance. Roll a wildcraft check contested by the target's coordination. For each of your dice that exceeds their result, the target suffers a penalty dice on their next attack and defense roll.

options.name: Action : Bestial Call
options.description: Choose a beast you have encountered and perfectly mimic its call. Roll a wildcraft check against the resilience of all beasts within a moderate (20 unit) distance whose tier is lower than the beast you are mimicking. Any beast that fails this check gains the afraid condition and takes 5 psychic damage. A creature cannot be affected by this ability more than one time per day.

options.name: Rugged Conditions
options.description: You are used to severe exposure to the elements. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +1 mitigation to cold and heat damage.

options.name: Toxicologist
options.description: Your knowledge of naturally occurring chemical compounds makes you an especially skilled alchemist. Gain +1 skill with alchemy. Additionally, when someone consumes an antidote you create that utilizes a venom, they become immune to that venom for one year.

options.name: Snares
options.description: +1 skill with engineering. While in a natural environment, you can spend an hour to create a snare that can trap a medium or smaller creature by making a engineering check to determine the quality of the trap. A creature trapped int his way gets the impaired condition only if it would not be possible for them to roll a higher fitness check contested against your engineering check.

options.name: At Peace with Nature
options.description: Gain +1 with wildcraft. While completing a full rest in a natural environment while suffering a long term mental condition or stress injury that forces you to roll a resilience or endurance check, roll a wildcraft check instead.
